titleStmt.title: An Exact account of the most remarkable fires which have happened in London and other places in England, from William the Conqueror to the reign of the best of kings, Charles the Second

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Head, at the Signe of the Bible in Little-Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
